DOC.brief_summary: To establish performance Dexcom G4 Platinum Modified Algorithm continuous monitoring system compare laboratory reference measurement .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Safety Study Dexcom G4 Platinum With Modified Algorithm
DOC.detailed_description: A study evaluate performance modification G4 Platinum CGM system adult diabetes .
DOC.criteria: Ages 18 year old Diagnosis Type 1 diabetes Type 2 diabetes Intensive Insulin Therapy ( ITT ) Willing participate clinic session Use Acetaminophen study period Pregnancy Hematocrit ( HCT ) < 35 % ( female ) 38 % ( male ) Dialysis , history cardiovascular disease , epilepsy , severe migraine past 6 month , adrenal disease , syncope , significant hypoglycemia unawareness , history severe hypoglycemia within last 6 month . Any condition , opinion Investigator , would interfere participation study pose excessive risk study staff .
